_header: Jesu lord of mights most / Father and son and holy ghost

BodAsh1491.First Lines:
And Goddes body þat I schal takeFor all my synnes I will
                    forsake…
BodAsh1491.Last Lines:
…He sawe fendes and soules flyeIn þat piler boþe
                    lowe and hiȝe
BodAsh1491.Editions:
Wagner,  Albrecht,
                        ed.  
             Tundale. Das mittelenglische Gedicht über die Vision des Tundalus
                auf Grund von vier Handschriften mit Einleitung und Anmerkungen.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1893.

BlCottCalAII.First Lines:
Ihesu lorde of myȝtes mosteffadyr & sone & holy
                    gooste…
BlCottCalAII.Last Lines:
…Iwone of ȝou þat han herde meSayth amen for
                    charyte
BlCottCalAII.Attributed Title:
Tundale (upper margin, f. 95v, and as RT thereafter on verso
                    sides only); Explicit Tundale (beneath last line, f. 107vb); A poeme
                    intitled Tundale (f. 1, sixteenth-century list of contents)

Middle English Texts

BLRoy17Bxliii.First Lines:
…ffor þe whiche þe penes were vn toldeÞat man
                    hym prayes of respite…
BLRoy17Bxliii.Last Lines:
…Ilkone of ȝow þat has herd meSayis amen for
                    charite

NLS1931.First Lines:
Ihesu cryst lord off myȝttes mostffader and son and holy
                    gost…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…ylkon of yow þat have hard meeSeyþe Amen for
                    charytee
NLS1931.Attributed Title:
Tyndale (heading, f. 98); tundale (RT); Explicit tundale quod hyhen
                    (f. 157v)

TokyoTak32.Note:
First 10 lines, other lines passim, and much of the final folio
                    illegible.
TokyoTak32.Attributed Title:
Her be gynnyht a good storie of Tundale (f. 166v); Tundale
                    (RT)
